Name: Increasing the fine for the use of unauthorized or fraudulent parking placards.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing the fine for the use of unauthorized or fraudulent parking placards

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Filed (End of Session)

Attachments.Name: December 19, 2017 - Stated Meeting Agenda with Links to Files

Summary: This bill would increase the penalty for using unauthorized or fraudulent City parking placards from $250 to $1,250.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1. Subdivision 6 of section 19-166 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended to read as follows: 
      6. Has in his or her custody or possession any of the cards hereinbefore mentioned, or any copy or reproduction thereof; is guilty of an offense punishable by a fine of not less than [two hundred fifty dollars] $1,250, or imprisonment for not more than thirty days, or both.
      ï¿½ 2.  This local law takes effect immediately.
     
     
     
     
     
     
     
     
     
     
     
     
MWC
11/21/17
LS 2075
